summary: Both an homage to and a re-imagining of the original 1968 film, this update follows a group of survivors trapped in a farmhouse battling a siege of undead zombies....in 3D!
cast: Brianna Brown|Joshua DesRoches|Sid Haig|Greg Travis|Johanna Black|Adam Chambers|Ken Ward|Alynia Phillips|Max E. Williams|Cristin Michele|Marcia Ann Burrs|Robert DiTillio|Brian La Rosa|Alan Gorg|Jason Brandt|Mark Sikes|Neil D'Monte|B.J. Winslow|Sean Durrie|Bill Quinn|Regan Michelle Ellis|Lawrence Greenstein|Maxwell Fasen|Kim Bateman|Btissam Belasri|Erin Blaisdell|Derek Brainard|Steve Ben Brown|Todd Brown|Preston Craig|Paul Dermen|Heather Dietz|Paymon Ebrahimadeh|Brad Estrada|Megan Evans|Nicholas Frankel|Nicole Gallo|Carol Harrison|Kelly Janes|Rachel Jendrzejewski|Justin Ketrinchek|Elizabeth Kirby|Kirk Klemme|Jaime Lawrence|David Long|Jeff Marinoff|Josh Mead|Lisa Motenko|Robert O'Connor|Jason Penarelli|Carmen Prince|Pat Querney|Robert Santini|Michael Schreder|Jeff Schwartz|Kurt Shearer|John Sisk|Michael Smith|Deborah Williams|Ian Zawadzri|Joe Duffy
title: Night of the Living Dead 3D
